name: mern-instagram-clone-ui
description: This is the front-end UI for the MERN stack Instagram Clone. It uses React as the front-end library. It is designed to be used in conjunction with a Node-Express back-end API. It interacts with the API to display messages and comments, and to allow users to create new messages and comments. It also utilizes Firebase for user authentication. It provides a front-end to perform CRUD operations against comments and messages in a visually pleasing way.It incorporates the React Router library to handle routing, and the React Bootstrap library to handle styling. Dark mode is also supported.
